Reviews

What is more, the owner was very welcoming. I strongly encourage you visiting this pizzeria.


First of all: the pizzeria offer affordable price, but I do believe that it’s much better to pay 1 euro more and eat in a better restaurant.


I was passing through X, I wanted to try the local cuisine and try out the unique flavors of pizza in X. What can I say? The best, greatest pizza I've eaten. I highly recommend everyone!


Pizza Ristorante is my favorite. I recommend it to everyone. In the past I baked a pizza myself at home, but I do not have so much time anymore, so I have to eat out in the city. Pizzeria x 100% met my expectations, I will definitely go back there and recommend it to everyone. I still have to try Margerita.


I have been looking for the best restaurant for a long time. Eventually, I found one. Delicious food, great atmosphere, affordable prices. I will be recommending this place to all my friends!
